item.title: Caffeine for Improved Athletic Performance
item.description:
Caffeine for Improved Athletic Performance

In a study of competitors at the Ironman World Championships, 73 percent of athletes reported that they used caffeine in an effort to improve their performance on course. Are you up on the latest thinking on caffeine, and do you have a caffeine intake strategy to effectively improve your athletic...

item.title: Caffeine to Increase Speed and Power
item.description:
Caffeine to Increase Speed and Power

The Human Biology and Nutritional Sciences department at University of Guelph, Ontario + Terry Graham This research was featured on the National Center for Biotechnology Information - Please Mix Responsibly

item.title: Performance Benefits of Caffeine for Endurance Athletes
item.description:
Performance Benefits of Caffeine for Endurance Athletes

Caffeine studies have proven caffeine may increase the mobilization of fat stored in the body to use as a primary energy source, which means an athlete's body can save more glycogen to use as fuel for muscles.
